hi haminasto,

if ur using bit torrent to upload this torrent...then right click on the torrent and click on "properties". now check the box for Ă?nitial Seeding" and click OK. Now close bit torrent completly, ie; file, exit. then reopen it once again and u'll see that it shows Ă?nitial Seeding"against the torrent. this is super seeding. It will help in faster upload. also follow the steps given by malikjee4 too. any other doubts..feel free to email me at jalcanther@gmail.com

cheers,
J

@ Haminasto,

U can call me Josh. The movie is downloading but at a very slow speed. Thats why I wanted to know whats the bandwidth of ur internet connection. is it 256 kbps, 512kbps, 1mbps, 2mbps etc? becos the higher ur bandwidth, the faster will be the upload too. also, if u see there are only 3 seeders ( seeders are the ones who have uploaded the movie partially or completely and kept it for sharing it with others on bit torrent) and 27 leechers (leechers are the ones purely downloading it from the seeders). so naturally upload is bound to be slow as 27 people are trying to download it from 3 people. anyways as people start completing the download and also seed the same, upload speed will automatically increase..

so keep seeding and I too will seed this movie as long as i can..

Cheers,
J

Aur to bahot kuchh hoga... yaad nahi aa rahaa abhi, collection dekhna padega.

But unluckily, mera DVD Writer Drive 4.5 Yrs. ka budha ho chuka hai & 1.5 Yrs. se wo bimaar ho chuka hai. Par kya karun doston, 2 mahino se meri naukri chali gayee hai, to jo chhoti si salary thi wo bhi nahi rahi ab. This way, I'm now penniless, paise nahi hai mere paas DVD Writer Drive kharidne ke... hell. Jo thode hai wo ghar ka raashan laane mein kaam aayenge agle kuchh dino ke liye, you know guys... ghar to chalaana padega. h..ha..haa

'Gharonda' maine apne ek dost ke Laptop Ke DVD Drive ke zariye kee. wo 2 dino ke liye Banglore se aaya tha through his company.

So friends, ye sab aap logon ko isliye bataaya ke, aap logon ko jhoothi aas deta rahoon ke - "abhi upload karunga, abhi upload karunga" to ummid bandhti rahegi.. aur main aapki ummid filhaal poori nahi kar paaunga ye main jaanta hoon. to kyun khwan-m-khwan... you know..

But don't get disappointed, chand dino ki baat hai, sab kuchh theek ho jaayega, fir main bhi aap logon ki tarah ye achhi cheezen upload kar paaunga with the grace of the God...

@all,

Friends, aap logon ki permission chaahiye, ye torrent delete karne ke liye - for half an hour. Edit karke fir se upload kar doonga. Edit isliye karna hai ki koi bechaara sahi dhang se search karega to use ye torrent mil nahi paayega...
